resources.string: Please update to the latest version, this version is not currently supported
Please insert a USB flash disk
No files in the USB flash disk
There is no latest version in the U disk
Your device is connected to the network. In order to ensure the safe use of the cold wallet, it is recommended that you disconnect all network connections.
To prevent sallet one from being maliciously modified, please go to the sallet one official website https://www.salletone.com/ to verify the current version of sha1/md5/APKHash
After entering the first letter, please select the word in the prompt box
Please do not enter the same word
The sending address is not generated by the device\'s mnemonic
